thread.title: Changing the Speed of a Texture Shader

post.author: wickedfingers
post.body: Hey All! Just was wondering if anybody knows if a texture shader speed can be changed. I want to take a moving texture such as this textures/hell/lava21hell_hub and make it move 3x faster.

post.author: pbmax
post.body:
sure...

find the material shader for it. then look for something like this:

scroll time*0.1, time*0.1

just adjust it to your needs.

post.author: wickedfingers
post.body: Cool, that's what I had in mind, I just wasn't sure whether the .mtr's could be edited. But they can!!! Besides your verifying reply, I remember seeing a Modsonline tutorial where the guy creates a .mtr file for his textures.
